timeline.bodyText:
One comment here. I see you stop this loop by setting stop too true and then you immediately move on to the next thing in your test.
You never wait on this Future  loop to complete. You may set stop to true, but if it's currently waiting (for 10s), it will still execute the subsequent code eventually which could result in your watermarks collection to be modified. That will most likely cause issues.
Consider rewriting this so that this method:

Returns the Futures.loop
The callsite holds it in a variable and waits for it to end.
Reducing the delay between iterations to 1s. That will prevent this from executing long after your test is done.
In the callback (line 933), bail out if stop is false.
